test.name: Cenário 01: Validar o logradouro que a API retorna

kw.name: Dado que tenho um cep válido
Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: Quando faço uma requisição GET para a API de CEP
Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=CEP, url=https://viacep.com.br/ws/, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: GET On Session
kw.msg: GET Request : url=https://viacep.com.br/ws/69084-470/json path_url=/ws/69084-470/json headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.3', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None

GET Response : url=https://viacep.com.br/ws/69084-470/json status=200, reason=OK headers={'Server': 'nginx/1.22.0', 'Date': 'Mon, 23 Dec 2024 20:38:24 GMT', 'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Transfer-Encoding': 'chunked', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Expires': 'Mon, 23 Dec 2024 21:38:24 GMT', 'Cache-Control': 'max-age=3600, public', 'Pragma': 'public', 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin': '*', 'Access-Control-Allow-Methods': 'GET', 'Access-Control-Allow-Headers': 'Content-Type, X-Request-With, X-Requested-By', 'Access-Control-Allow-Credentials': 'true', 'Access-Control-Max-Age': '86400'} body={ "cep": "69084-470", "logradouro": "Rua Cacatua", "complemento": "", "unidade": "", "bairro": "Zumbi dos Palmares", "localidade": "Manaus", "uf": "AM", "estado": "Amazonas", "regiao": "Norte", "ibge": "1302603", "gia": "", "ddd": "92", "siafi": "0255" }

C:\Users\Berg\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python311\Lib\site-packages\urllib3\connectionpool.py:1099: InsecureRequestWarning: Unverified HTTPS request is being made to host 'viacep.com.br'. Adding certificate verification is strongly advised. See: https://urllib3.readthedocs.io/en/latest/advanced-usage.html#tls-warnings warnings.warn(
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.

kw.name: Convert To Dictionary
kw.doc: Converts the given ``item`` to a Python ``dict`` type.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: Então o logradouro da resposta deve ser "Rua Cacatua"
Get From Dictionary
kw.doc: Returns a value from the given ``dictionary`` based on the given ``key``.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.
